metadata.title: CVE-2023-0667 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-craftedMSMMS packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, in an unusualconfiguration, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possiblycode execution in the context of the process running Wireshark

criterions.comment: wireshark package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
